and g.s_start_time > now() and g.s_end_time > now()

SELECT count(distinct(a.id)) from t_mall_product a WHERE a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
AND a.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND a.pro_name like '%${proName}%'
AND a.id in (select product_id from t_mall_product_group where group_id = #{groupId})

select b.id, b.product_id as productId, b.s_name as sName, b.s_price as sPrice, b.s_start_time as sStartTime, b.s_end_time as sEndTime, b.s_max_buy_num as sMaxBuyNum, b.shop_id as shopId, c.image_url as imageUrl,e.specifica_img_url as specImageUrl,p.is_specifica as isSpecifica,p.pro_name as proName ,if(p.is_specifica = 0 ,p.pro_price,d.inv_price) as proPrice,p.pro_stock_total as proStockTotal from t_mall_seckill b left join t_mall_product p on b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price,id FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON b.product_id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id where b.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(gb.`product_id`) as count,gb.`product_id` from t_mall_seckill gb WHERE gb.is_delete=0 and gb.is_use=1 and ((gb.s_start_time <= now() and now() < gb.s_end_time ) or (gb.s_start_time > now() and gb.s_end_time > now()))
and gb.product_id in
#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
GROUP BY gb.`product_id`
